title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 95.4 - Exchange of ticket
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 95.4 - Exchange of ticket

State Regulations

Where a ticket after purchase is exchanged for another
ticket of higher or lower value, the tax applies to the total admission price
paid, that is, the price paid for the original ticket plus any additional price
paid upon the exchange, or minus any refund made to the purchaser upon the
exchange. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
95.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
